#Build libqq-pidgin by emerge

= Introduction =
  This is a guide to build libqq-pidgin for pidgin in gentoo

= Details =

First , add microcai's overlay

[https://github.com/microcai/myoverlay/]

{{{
git clone git://github.com/microcai/myoverlay.git /var/lib/microcaioverlay
vim /etc/make.conf
}}}

append
{{{
PORTDIR_OVERLAY="
$PORTDIR_OVERLAY
/var/lib/microcaioverlay
"}}}

Then` USE="-qq" emerge pidgin-qq2010 -av `
